page.title: 11LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: Tonge Moor has a large selection of shops. It is very convenient for older people and mothers with young children. Most of the shops are small and busy. Many of them are food shops; grocers, greengrocers, confectioners and butchers. There are two post offices and a bank. Amongst non-food shops there is a jewellers, photographers, hairdressers, shoe shop, pet store, florists and a few news agents and off licences. Many of the shops sell sweets. Children from our school call in on the way to and from school. The fish and chip shops, pie shops,the Chinese Takeaway and cafes are very busy at dinner time and tea time. Some of them open later as well for people to call in on their way home from the pub or club.
